author: ajaquith
msg: Moved all images in top-level /images directory to template /images dir, and made code/JSP changes to make sure they can be "found" as needed by the TemplateManager resource resolver.

author: dwoods
msg: OPENJPA-1520 Allow using JDK 1.5 to compile/run the junits by using -Ptest-java5,test-derby -Djava5.home=<1.5 JDK home>, so we can verify that the 1.6 built artifacts will still work for 1.5 users.

author: zwoop
msg: TS-200: Fix the RAT exclude file for new addition (CHANGES). One file
also had its license blurb mangled into all lower case, so fixed that.

author: rott
msg: log warnings for NoClassDefFoundErrors during init

author: ajaquith
msg: Captcha interface gains an isEnabled() method to allow SpamProtect tag to check whether the CAPTCHA is operational before generating output. This is required in stand-alone or testing scenarios where an outbound network connection cannot be assumed.
